title: ResourcePile
tagline: A collection of resources for various competitive Minecraft networks

dtcm.keywords: dtcm dtmc dtc dtm Destroy the Monument

dtmc.keywords: dtcm dtmc dtc dtm Destroy the Monument

ff.keywords: ff flagfootball flag football foot ball

pgm.label: PGM
pgm.message:
This map has been specifically designed and tested to be used with the maintained PGMDev version of PGM (PvP Game Manager). ResourcePile recommends that you use the most up-to-date version of this PGM in order to have the best experience with this map.

To setup your own PGM server, please follow this guide. Further PGM support can be found in the PGM Discord.

pgm_legacy.label: PGM (Legacy)
pgm_legacy.message:
This map has been designed and tested to be used with Overcast's open source plugins (Project Ares) and we recommend using those to have the best experience with this map. This map may also include one of Overcast's standard XML files, which all can be found here to download.

Important: If you prefer to use the (maintained) 1.8 fork of Project Ares, you can find that here instead. Maps using the XML protocol 1.4.1 and above may not work and will have to be manually downgraded to at least protocol 1.4.0. Additionally, the Minecraft world will have to be converted to Minecraft version 1.8. This can be easily done using this NBT converter tool.
pgm_legacy.prompt: This map was designed for a legacy version of PGM

pgm_stratus.label: PGM (Stratus Fork)
pgm_stratus.message: This map has been designed and tested to be used with Stratus' fork of Overcast's open source plugins and we recommend using those to have the best experience with this map. This map may also include one of Overcast's standard XML files, which all can be found here to download.

atlas.label: Atlas
atlas.message: This map has been designed and tested to be used with Avcius' open source plugins and we recommend using those to have the best experience with this map.

atlas_depreciated.label: Atlas (Depreciated)
atlas_depreciated.message: This map was designed for an older version of Atlas and will not work with the open source version. The map's XML will need to be upgraded in order to be functional.
atlas_depreciated.prompt: This map uses a depreciated version of Atlas

rfw.label: RFW
rfw.message: This map has been designed and tested to be used with Overcast's open source plugins and we recommend using those to have the best experience with this map. This map may also include one of Overcast's standard XML files, which all can be found here to download.

rfw_no_xml.label: RFW (No XML)
rfw_no_xml.message: This map has no XML file, and will need one created before it can be used with PGM.
rfw_no_xml.prompt: This map lacks a needed XML file for PGM

mcresourcepile.name: MCResourcePile
mcresourcepile.description: ResourcePile is a community project which aims to provide various collections of resources for users with backgrounds in Overcast and similar networks. This is an ever evolving project with new content being added every few days, and we welcome anyone who wishes to contribute. Check us out on GitHub or join our Discord server!

occ.name: Overcast Community
occ.description: Overcast Community has all the classic maps from the days of Overcast Network, available for the enjoyment of our community. We believe it's important to continue to contribute towards PGM and its overall continuity, so we're happy to share maps for those who would like to use them for their own servers. Feel free to join our Discord server if you'd like to check us out, or join our server at play.oc.tc!

stratus.name: Stratus Network
stratus.description: Founded in early 2017, the Stratus Network aims to become the next home for the PGM plugin. With it and other custom-coded plugins, Stratus offers both competitive and casual team-based PvP and, most importantly, a dedicated and awesome community. Check us out on our Discord, or join us at play.stratus.network

warzone.name: Warzone
warzone.description: Hosted on Minehut, Warzone is a PGM server that introduces lots of new faces to team organized, objective oriented gameplay. With a rich history, we offer a ton of original maps for our players' enjoyment. Come join our Discord or hop right into the action at play.warzone.network!
